item.description:
Stanislas Polu on Twitter

“AGI does not pop up yet (even if one of the big labs have an internal LLM AlphaZero moment in 2023). Investor craziness dies out, short-context LLM assistants (as per above #1 #3) are heavily commoditized. Still 1-2 massive companies start to emerge in the B2B space #product”

URL: https://twitter.com/spolu/status/1602283278421082114

item.title: An LLM for your speeding ticket?
item.description:
Joshua Browder on Twitter

“Anyone with a speeding ticket hearing coming up, please DM me. We want to build a @donotpay bot that listens to the court hearing via your AirPods and whispers what to say with GPT-3 and LLMs. We just want to experiment and will pay the ticket, even if you lose!”

URL: https://twitter.com/jbrowder1/status/1602484316339986432?s=46&t=2FxK66N-chcZY0KoU2kSsg
